ctc.title: Discovering Spiritual Community
ctc.summary: Discovering Spiritual Community takes you on a journey through history, exploring how people connected with God through challenges, questions, and life-changing moments.

para.1: Discovering Spiritual Community takes you on a journey through history, exploring how people connected with God through challenges, questions, and life-changing moments. If you're curious about faith, purpose, and belonging, this series is a great place to start.
para.2: Gather your friends to explore how God prepared people for the arrival of Jesus and the spiritual community he began.

life.title: Wisdom for Life
life.summary: Discover practical wisdom from Jesus and his early followers that still transforms lives today.

para.1: These are some of the things that Jesus and his early followers taught.
para.2: Many people have seen their lives transformed as they asked Jesus to give them the power to put these teachings into action.
